attributes.action: Regulate the press and make them report good and bad news in the correct proportion to real life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ratio of bad news in the papers out weighs the good news, but in real life the ratio of good news out weighs the bad news. Reporting the news to people is a moral responsibility, and the obsession with bad news in this country is creating a mentally ill and unbalanced society... The press should be forced to deliver 100% facts to the nation, and the news will never be fact until we start reportion good and bad news in the same proportion as real life... If newspapers don't sell when they print good news, then let them all go bust, because we'd be better off without them rather than continue to allow them to perpetuate depression!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
